messages.subject: buying koshirae
messages.msgSnippet: There are a lot of opportunities to buy koshirae at auction these days.  How possible is it to buy koshirae on the basis of measurements without actually
messages.messageBody:
There are a lot of opportunities to buy koshirae at auction these days. How
possible is it to buy koshirae on the basis of measurements without actually
trying the fit of koshirae to blade? Are there any workable rules of thumb
about how close a fit needs to be?

David Zincavage
